rcsbids moduleÔÉÅ

Retrieve the list of PDB IDs from the RCSB website, given an advanced query in json format.

UsageÔÉÅ

python rcsbids.py --query query.json --output output.txt
rcsbids.load_pdb_ids(pdb_ids_file: str) → list[source]ÔÉÅ

Load the list of PDB IDs from a file.

Automatically detect the separator used in the file, which is the 5th character. Then check that last character of the file is the same character.

Parameters

pdb_ids_file ‚Äì path to the file containing the list of PDB IDs.

rcsbids.retrieve_pdb_ids(query: str) → list[source]ÔÉÅ

Retrieve the list of PDB IDs from the RCSB website, given an advanced query in json format.

Parameters

query ‚Äì advanced query in json format.

Returns

list of PDB IDs.

rcsbids.search_and_download_ids(query: str, output: str, separator: str = '\n') → list[source]ÔÉÅ

Search and download PDB IDs from the RCSB website, given an advanced query in json format.

Parameters

  • query ‚Äì path to the json file containing the advanced query.

  • output ‚Äì path to the output file.

rcsbids.store_pdb_ids(ids: list, dest: str, separator: str = '\n') → None[source]ÔÉÅ

Store the list of PDB IDs in a file.
